SEARCH
Package controllers.listeners.io

Class SaveFileListener

java.lang.Object
controllers.listeners.io.SaveFileListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class SaveFileListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Implements ActionListener interface to create an event listener for Save File button of the application menu. It uses ExamIO to load exam entries from a file
See Also:
  • ExamIO
  • ExamsRowSorter
  • AbstractExam
